Package coffee.khyonieheart.eden.utils

Class DataUtils

java.lang.Object
coffee.khyonieheart.eden.utils.DataUtils
public class DataUtils extends Object
A collection of slightly random utilities involving classes and data.
Author:
Yuki_emeralis

      class_ - The class that supposedly contains a method
      classParams - The parameters for the method
      Returns:

    • concatMultipleCollections

      @SafeVarargs public static <T> List<T> concatMultipleCollections(Collection<T>... collections)
      Combines a variable number of collections of type T into one ArrayList.

      This ArrayList cannot be modified and is NOT backed by any of the collections given. Please ensure you understand this principle before invoking this method.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of all the given collections.
      Parameters:
      collections - A variable argument list of collections of type T.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list containing all the elements of all the collections given.

    • estimatePasswordStrength

      public static long estimatePasswordStrength(String input)

    • fixColor

      public static String fixColor(String in)
      Attempts to infer missing data for a 24 bit (#RRGGBB) hex color.

      - # -> #000000 (Black)

      - #D -> #DDDDDD

      - #DD -> #DDDDDD

      - #RGB -> #R*G*B*

      - #RRGB -> #RRG*B*

      - #RRGGB -> #RRGGB*

      Parameters:
      in - Input hex color, starting with "#"
      Returns:
      Input hex color, converted to a color with 6 hex digits

    • toKeyValuePairSet

      public static <K, V> List<DataUtils.KeyValuePair<K,V>> toKeyValuePairSet(Map<K,V> map)
      Converts a Map<K, V> to a list of individual key/value pairs. List is populated in the order returned by the map's iterator. 
      
Map<String, Integer> mapData = Map.of(
   "a", 42, 
   "b", 7, 
   "c", 11 );

List<KeyValuePair<String, Integer>> kvPairList = DataUtils.toKeyValuePairSet(mapData);

assert kvPairList.get(0).getKey().equals("a");
assert kvPairList.get(0).getValue().equals(42);
      Type Parameters:
      K - Key type
      V - Value type
      Parameters:
      map - Map input
      Returns:
      A list containing the ordered pairs contained in the given map

    • getJavaVersion

      public static int getJavaVersion()
      Obtains the current Java version running on this server.
      Returns:
      JRE version in use by the server

    • mapList

      public static <A, B> List<B> mapList(List<A> input, IDataListMap<A,B> conversionMethod)
      Converts a list of A into a list of B.
      Type Parameters:
      A - Original type
      B - Final type
      Parameters:
      input - A list of type A.
      Returns:
      A list of type B.

    • getPreviousCaller

      public static StackTraceElement getPreviousCaller(Thread thread)
      Gets the stacktrace element before the method that called this method.

      For example: 

      
void methodA() {
   methodB();
}
 
void methodB() {
   StackTraceElement element = getPreviousCaller(Thread.currentThread());

   // Obtain the stacktrace element for the previous method
   assert element.getMethodName().equals("methodA");
}
      This method will fail and return null if there isn't a method called before the caller (such as main or Thread.start()).
      Parameters:
      thread - The thread to obtain a stacktrace element from.
      Returns:
      A stacktrace element corresponding to the method prior to the caller of this method. May return null if no such element exists.
